sources.title: A Fool There Was
sources.description: Title: A Fool There Was Summary: A married diplomat falls hopelessly under the spell of a predatory woman. Directed by: Frank Powell Actors: Runa Hodges, Mabel Frenyear, Edward José Production Company: Fox Film Corporation Release Date: 12 January 1915 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.33 : 1 Color: Black and White John Schuyler, happily married Wall Street lawyer, is appointed as special diplomatic representative to England. By an unhappy accident, his wife and child can't come along; but on the ship with him is "The Vampire," a "notorious woman" who lives off a succession of men she has seduced and ruined. Slighted by Mrs. Schuyler, she has set her sights on the husband. Two months later, we find the Fool languishing with the mistress who has him enmeshed in her toils. Will he follow the others to the depths of degradation?

sources.title: A Fool There Was
sources.description: From IMDb : A married diplomat falls hopelessly under the spell of a predatory woman. Stars: Theda Bara, Edward José, Mabel Frenyear, Runa Hodges, May Allison, Clifford Bruce, Victor Benoit, Frank Powell, and Minna Gale

metadata.Plot: John Schuyler, happily married Wall Street lawyer, is appointed as special diplomatic representative to England. By an unhappy accident, his wife and child can't come along; but on the ship with him is "The Vampire," a "notorious woman" who lives off a succession of men she has seduced and ruined. Slighted by Mrs. Schuyler, she has set her sights on the husband. Two months later, we find the Fool languishing with the mistress who has him enmeshed in her toils. Will he follow the others to the depths of degradation?
metadata.Writer: Porter Emerson Browne, Rudyard Kipling, Roy L. McCardell
metadata.Actors: Theda Bara, Edward José, Mabel Frenyear
